section.title: Refreshing Instances and Images
section.para: Refresh your instances to get the latest data the provider can access. This includes information such as the power state, container, and hardware devices attached to the instance.

step.para: Click the accordion for the desired items to analyze.
Click the checkboxes for the items to refresh.
